short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure and easy-to-use hybrid account abstraction wallet that supports EOAs and Smart Accounts on Ethereum and EVM chains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Here is what Ambire Wallet has to offer:

THE BASICS
- Native support for EOAs (e.g., your MetaMask) and Smart Accounts
- Self-custodial by design (you have full control over your assets)
- Supports Ethereum and all EVM chains, including Optimism, Arbitrum, Base, Scroll,  Polygon, Gnosis, and Avalanche
- Same wallet address across all blockchains, including for Smart Accounts
- Audited over 10 times with no critical vulnerabilities found

SECURITY FEATURES
- Hardware wallet support (Trezor, Ledger, Grid+)
- Advanced transaction simulation onchain (shows the future wallet balance before the transaction is executed)
- Open-source and continually-audited code
- Limited token approvals preventing wallet drains

META-TRANSACTIONS
- Bundle multiple actions into a single transaction and skip the token approvals
- Simulate transaction outcomes in a risk-free environment
- Automatic front-running/sandwiching protection via Flashbots

GAS FEES SAVINGS
- Pay for gas in stablecoins, native, or ERC-20 tokens with Ambire Gas Tank
- Cross-chain gas payments: top up on any chain and pay on any other
- Get cashback for using the Gas Tank feature

THE $WALLET DAO
- Governed by the $WALLET token holders
- Get rewarded with $WALLET tokens for playing Ambire Legends
- Cast your feature request on the dedicated platform

---
FAQ

Q: Can I use my existing wallet with Ambire?
A: Yes, you can use your existing MetaMask, Rabby, Zerion, or any other EOA wallet with Ambire Wallet. You can import your wallet by entering your seed phrase or connecting a hardware wallet like Trezor, Ledger, or Grid.

Q: What does hybrid account abstraction mean?
A: Ambire Wallet's hybrid account abstraction allows for the support of both Externally Owned Accounts (EOAs) and Smart Accounts within the same wallet. This feature enables you to derive multiple EOAs and Smart Accounts from a single root key, such as your seed phrase or a hardware wallet.

Q: How secure is Ambire Wallet?
A: Ambire Wallet is open-source and developed by an experienced team. It supports major hardware wallets like Trezor, Ledger, and Grid for the utmost security. Additionally, it has been rigorously audited over 10 times, with no significant vulnerabilities found.

Q: What EVM networks does Ambire Wallet support?
A: Ambire Wallet supports all EVM-compatible networks. It provides the convenience of using the same address across different chains, even for Smart Accounts.

Q: What is Ambire Legends, and how can I participate?
A: Ambire Legends is a quest-based campaign designed exclusively for Ambire Wallet extension users. Participants can mint NFT characters, level them up, and engage in various onchain quests using Smart Accounts to earn experience points (XP). Accumulated XP contributes towards a share of the 195 million $WALLET token prize pool. The best part is that all activity across supported chains—Ethereum, Base, Optimism, Scroll, and Arbitrum—accrues XP. Plus, the first NFT character mint and the initial 3-wheel spins are sponsored and free.
